about_the_game:
『HauntedManager』 is a story about opening a haunted house with ghost staff, where the goal is to ensure no one ever reaches the end.
Enjoy a primitive top-down tower defense experience while managing admission restrictions and budget.

Description

  • You are the manager of a haunted house.
  • Frighten your guests into leaving before they reach the goal.
  • Command the playful ghost staff.
  • Guide guests who start crying to the exit, so they don't ruin the experience for others.
  • Occasionally, elite ghosts from the main mansion will come to harass you. You can either fend them off or recruit them.

Other Information

  • A short game lasting 2-3 hours.
  • An easy mode is available.
  • Includes some hand-drawn animations.

Featured Ghost Staff

  • Doppelgänger: Not even they know whose doppelgänger they are. Essentially just a human.
  • Blakra: The embodiment of the once-famous Blakra. Now too well-known to scare anyone.
  • Hachishaku: Despite being only seven shaku tall, they make up for it with physical prowess. They're also good at basketball.
And many more!
